entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Îles-de-la-Madeleine
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:21 PM ADT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Îles de la Madeleine Airport 02:00 AM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023
Temperature: -2.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -3.3°C
Wind: SE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening. Snow and blowing snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 80 overnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 13 March 2023
